:::Godfather:::

::As Shockaract sleeps, Godfather thinks about what he said::
Godfather: It's true that we haven't killed anyone yet. In fact is, the only 
thing ive done remotely close to killing was putting that horse's head in 
that idiot Alliance member's bed.  Maybe he was right.....

--part1_11a.169d4dd.287c4f59_boundary
